sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1189834_teampu_0.selectTeams</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>selectTeams</name><script><![CDATA[var selectTeams = Class.create();
selectTeams.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getTeamsByEventId: function(eventId) {
        var result = {};
        var eventGR = new GlideRecord('x_1189834_teampu_0_event'); // Replace 'u_event' with your actual event table
        if (eventGR.get(eventId)) {
            result.homeTeam = eventGR.home_team; // Replace 'u_home_team' with your actual home team field
            result.awayTeam = eventGR.away_team; // Replace 'u_away_team' with your actual away team field
        }
        return JSON.stringify(result);
    },

    type: 'selectTeams'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-21 21:33:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>b4c53dff47fe4e50bd3cb616536d4374</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>selectTeams</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Community Soccer League" source="x_1189834_teampu_0">ddfd0ef7478d4650bd3cb616536d4350</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Community Soccer League">ddfd0ef7478d4650bd3cb616536d4350</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b4c53dff47fe4e50bd3cb616536d4374</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-21 21:33:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
